text: Mandela and de Klerk is a 1997 British television movie about the relationship between President of South Africa Nelson Mandela and former State-Governor F. W. de Klerk. Sidney Poitier played Mandela and Michael Caine played de Klerk. It was released on February 16, 1997. Category:British drama movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:Movies about Apartheid Category:Movies about Nelson Mandela
title: Mandela and de Klerk
